import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import Message from "../components/Message"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); //Price calculation cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce( (acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 20 ); const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log("ordered"); }; return ( <> {/* You should add the current step plus all previous steps */}

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method:

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items:

{!cart.cartItems.length ? ( Your cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} ✘ € {item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Your Products: € {cart.itemsPrice} Shipping € {cart.shippingPrice} Tax € {cart.taxPrice} Total € {cart.totalPrice} ); }; export default PlaceOrderScreen;
